item.title: Currencies
item.description: Localization-Currencies-List-Add-Edit Currency format setting Localization > Currencies > Edit/Add Page USER STORY As a merchant, I want to manage the display of my currencies in the Front Office depending on the language if needed in order to adapt my shop to my clients' visual expectations. WHY We have understood there is a big complexity on the currency display choose when you shop is for B2C or B2B, or when you sell in countries sharing the same symbol currency as in Latin America countries with the pesos.

item.title: Languages
item.description: SPECIFICATIONS - INTERNATIONAL > LOCALIZATION > LANGUAGES Grid LanguageGridDefinitionFactory.php Default action in the button: Edit Other available actions in the menu: Delete Row action: Edit Row action does not apply to the ID’s checkbox column and to columns with enable/disable actions.
